en_text: Mayoi no hitoyo ni In the night I spend lost
jp_text: 迷いの一夜に明星は誘う
google_translated: A star invites the star on the night

en_text: Shi shite owaranu This will not end in my death
jp_text: 死して終わらぬ
google_translated: Death and end

en_text: Yume wo kogaredomo I long for my dream
jp_text: 夢を焦がれども
google_translated: Dreams

en_text: Reppu no kouya de In the windswept wilderness
jp_text: 烈風の荒野で 蝶よ花よと生き
google_translated: Flower flutter and life in the wilderness

en_text: Tokoshie no haru ni sakisou maboroshi Blooming together in a mirage of eternal Spring
jp_text: とこしえの春に 咲き添うまぼろし
google_translated: Boiled blooming in the spring

en_text: Kokoro no nishiki wo shinjiteite kudasai Please believe in the finery within my heart
jp_text: 心の錦を信じていてください
google_translated: Please believe in the heart of the heart

en_text: Ashimoto no They vanish like...
jp_text: 足下の草に露は消えもせで
google_translated: Dew on the grass under the foot disappear

en_text: The word "repudiate" is half-hearted.
jp_text: 否定という言葉すら生ぬるい
google_translated: The word "denial"

en_text: If my father is the symbol of Britannia, then he must be crushed utterly!
jp_text: 父が… あの男が… ブリタニアの象徴ならば潰すまで
google_translated: My father ... that man ... until the symbol of Britannia is crushed

en_text: And if my sister Cornelia stands in my path, she will suffer the same fate!
jp_text: その道行きに姉上 コーネリアが居るなら 同じ事
google_translated: If there is a sister Cornelia for the road, the same thing

en_text: As long as I possess the Geass, I can do this by myself!
jp_text: ギアスさえあれば 俺は１人で！
google_translated: If you even gear, I am one person!
